item.title: IBM to Collaborate with Singaporean Agencies over Blockchain
item.description:
IBM to Collaborate with Singaporean Agencies over Blockchain

The center will aid and accommodate Singapore's blockchain startups and entrepreneurs to collaborate with the city-state's reputable and well established institutions in the finance and trade industries. IBM, International Business Machines Corporation, ( NYSE:IBM) has established its first Centre for Blockchain Innovation in Singapore with the assistance from the city-state's Economic Development Board and Monetary Authority.

item.title: New Sia GPU Miner for OpenCL Forked by Genoil Now Available
item.description:
New Sia GPU Miner for OpenCL Forked by Genoil Now Available

Siacoin (SC) is getting a lot of attention lately and there is now a new fork of the miner available made by Genoil ( source).

item.title: South African Bank Joins R3 Blockchain Consortium - CoinDesk
item.description:
South African Bank Joins R3 Blockchain Consortium - CoinDesk

One of South Africa's largest banks has joined the global blockchain consortium led by R3CEV. Absa Bank, a subsidiary of Barclays Africa, announced today that it would be joining the 40-plus consortium, which includes a range of banks and non-bank financial institutions worldwide.

item.title: Cashaa Remittance To Go Live Using Peer to Peer Transactions
item.description:
Cashaa Remittance To Go Live Using Peer to Peer Transactions

New cash-to-cash remittance company, Cashaa, ends its three months testing period and claims to have a success as it plans to fully go live. According to co-Founder and CEO at Cashaa, Kumar Gaurav, the company started their trading platform BTC2BID to test and validate their model on April 3, after which a London office was established about two months later, while the development centre remains in Mumbai, India.

item.title: Bitprompt Outs Itself As A Bitcoin Cloud Mining Ponzi Scheme
item.description:
Bitprompt Outs Itself As A Bitcoin Cloud Mining Ponzi Scheme

The time has come to look at another Bitcoin scam site, called Bitpromt. The number of companies users can invest in is quite staggering these days. Similar to most other businesses looking to take user's funds, cloud mining is the flavor of the month. Luckily, this company is showing its investment plans on beforehand.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: Knock Arrows, Don't Loose
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis: Knock Arrows, Don't Loose

Bitcoin price pushed through an important trendline intersection today. The technical picture biases further toward a bullish outlook. Time for traders to take aim, but don't loose your arrows just yet. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member? Join now.

item.title: Can web hosting business be irrelevant with Blockchain?
item.description:
Can web hosting business be irrelevant with Blockchain?

When I first moved to the US in the 90's I travelled a lot from Silicon Valley to Florida for a project I was working on. I thought it was so cool how you could just jump on a 5-hour flight with just a driving license and that you could turn up just before the plane took off (it was so easy before 9/11).

item.title: Santander Names Blythe Masters Senior Blockchain Advisor - CoinDesk
item.description:
Santander Names Blythe Masters Senior Blockchain Advisor - CoinDesk

Banco Santander has named Digital Asset Holdings (DAH) CEO Blythe Masters to a new role as senior blockchain advisor. Masters previously held a non-executive position as chair of the board of Santander Consumer USA, a division of the company that specializes in auto lending, a seat she resigned from in conjunction with the news.

item.title: Deutsche Bank: EU Banks Need $166 Billion Bailout
item.description:
Deutsche Bank: EU Banks Need $166 Billion Bailout

According to chief economist of Deutsche Bank, European banks urgently need a $166 billion bailout. David Folkerts-Landau, Deutsche-Bank AG's chief economist, says EU banks desperately need significant recapitalization efforts, Italian banks in particular. "Europe is extremely sick and must start dealing with its problems extremely quickly, or else there may be an accident.

item.title: Technology and Choice #09, Ernest Hancock
item.description:
Technology and Choice #09, Ernest Hancock

In this Episode When I was at The Porcupine Freedom Festive in New Hampshire, I had the chance to sit down with Ernest Hancock of Freedom's Phoenix, along with the hosts of another podcast, Liberty Cafe. We had fun. Hope you enjoy it.
